meanings.sent1: Her demode dress was from a different era.
meanings.sent2: The demode fashion trend faded away quickly.
meanings.sent3: He tried to bring back demode clothing, but no one followed.
meanings.sent5: The demode look made her stand out for all the wrong reasons.

meanings.definition: No longer fashionable or in current use.
meanings.sent1: The demode technology was replaced by newer models.
meanings.sent2: His demode phone couldn't keep up with the latest apps.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly called her old car demode compared to the sleek new models.
meanings.sent4: The demode music player gathered dust in the corner.
meanings.sent5: Wearing demode sneakers made him feel like a blast from the past.
